title: Were CA Wineries Ordered to Close Indoor Operations While Newsom’s Remained Open?
subtitle: Businesses scaled back operations in the summer of 2020 as COVID-19 cases spread in counties across California.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: California Gov. Gavin Newsom’s winery in Napa County remained open in July 2020 even as he ordered other wineries and businesses to close their indoor operations around the state.
